No. 2295/58  -  Saturday,  September  03,  2022
EXTRAORDINARY
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART IV (B) — LOcAL  GOVERNmENT
Local Government Notification
1a- pG 6013 - 08 (10/2022) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
PRADEShIYA  SABhA  BINGIRIYA
It is hereby notified for the public information that it has been decided under the resolution No. 4/2022/08/05 – XXVVII  
moved at the General Conference held on 09/08/2022 at Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya that all the roads and thoroughfares for 
which legal action had not been filed in a proper Judicial Court before the date specified or roads and thoroughfares confirmed 
as the roads and thoroughfares that should be owned by Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya as per the Decree of a Judicial Court 
in which a case had been filed before the said date and not mentioned in the following Schedule from among the roads and 
thoroughfares given in the list of the Schedule of the notification published in the Extraordinary Gazette Paper No. 2274/20 
and dated 07/04/2022 according to the resolution No. 04/2022/08/05-XXVVII made at the Pradeshiya Sabha conference 
held on 07/04/2022, shall be confirmed as roads and thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya in terms of 
orders made by the series of “Orders on publication of notifications specifying preparation of plans and lists for roads and 
thoroughfares maintained by the Pradeshiya Sabha within the North Western Province” published by Extraordinary Gazette 
paper No. 2238/35 and dated 30th July 2021 by the Hon. Governor in the North Western Province and in terms of the order 
by Section 24(1) of Pradeshiya Sabha Act, No. 15 of 1987.
 It is further notified that, alist of said roads and thoroughfares has been included in the Schedule hereto and all the roads and 
thoroughfares mentioned in that Schedule shall be considered as roads and thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya Sabha 
Alawwa under Sub Section (5) of Section 24 of Pradeshiya Sabha Act.
 
                                                                                  
   E. M. DiMuth thushara Ekanayaka,
 Chairman, 
 Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya.
At Bingiriya Pradeshiya Sabha,     
Head Office,                                        
26
th of August 2022.

IV^wd& jeks fldgi - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha w;s úfYI .eiÜ m;%h - 2022'09'03
Part IV (B) - GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA - 03.09.2022
2aResolution
Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya proposes that the roads and thoroughfares for which legal actions has not been filed in a proper Judicial Court and not mentioned 
in the following Schedule from among the roads and thoroughfares given in the list of the Schedule of the notification published in the Extraordinary Gazette 
Paper No. 2274/20 and dated 07/04/2022 according to the resolution No. 04/2022/01/05-III made at the Pradeshiya Sabha conference held on 11/01/2022, shall be 
confirmed as roads and thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya Sabha Bingiriya in terms of orders made by the series of  “Orders on publication of notifications 
specifying preparation of plans and lists for roads and thoroughfares maintained by the Pradeshiya Sabha within the North Western Province” published by 
Extraordinary Gazette Paper No. 2238/35 and dated 30th July 2021 by the Hon. Governor in the North Western Province and in terms of the order by Section 24(1) 
of Pradeshiya Sabha Act, No. 15 of 1987.
